text: Öveç (Kurdish: Sirûnis) is a village in the Şemdinli district of Hakkari province.https://www.yerelnet.org.tr/koyler/koy.php?koyid=247885 ==Population== {| class="wikitable" width=200 ! colspan=2 |Population data by years |- | align="center" | 2007 | align="right" | 560 |- | align="center" | 2000 | align="right" | 553 |- | align="center" | 1997 | align="right" | 546 |- | align="center" | 1990 | align="right" | 1,158 |- | align="center" | 1985 | align="right" | 867 |} ==See also== *Tkhuma Tribe *Tyari *Yuksekova (Gawar) *Jilu ==References== Category:Assyrian communities in Turkey Category:Kurdish settlements in Turkey Category:Villages in Hakkâri Province Category:Places of the Assyrian genocide
title: Öveç, Şemdinli
